text: THIRD: In the event I have prepared a list directing the disposition of certain items of personal property as authorized by Section 15-2-513 of the Idaho Code, I direct that said list shall govern the disposition of the specific items of personal property listed therein and shall take precedence over any inconsistent provisions of this Will.
